oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-04-30 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from April 30, 1960. Featuring Don Russell (announcer), Hank Snow (host/performer), guest performer Carl Butler, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Jimmie Selph, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1073rd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Snow; Archie Campbell; Tommy Jackson; Jimmie Selph
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Don Russell introduces Hank Snow -- Walkin' And Talkin' (Hank Snow) -- Opening statement (Don Russell, Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow introduces Carl Butler -- Guilty Tears (Carl Butler) -- Prince Albert commercial (Don Russell, Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow introduces Tommy Jackson and Jimmie Selph -- Soldier's Joy (Tommy Jackson fiddle, Jimmie Selph calls) -- Don Russell and Hank Snow talk -- These Things Shall Pass (Hank Snow)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Smathers, Ben, -1990; Stoney Mountain Cloggers; Atkins, Chet; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Jackson, Tommy; Campbell, Archie; Minnie Pearl; Selph, Jimmy; Snow, Hank; Butler, Carl
